name: I Saw A Painting
description:
I Saw a Painting is primarily a gaze based game, you will be given about 2 and a half minutes to look around the room as paint blobs start launching in the direction you are looking coloring in the environment.

After you are done your room painting will be uploaded online, and you will be able to see it and other uploaded room paintings.

I honestly made this little project in a little under a month total as an experiment and just wanted to share it somewhere.
